policies.involuntary_refund:
Involuntary Refund:
• If change is ≥3 hours and passenger declines → full refund allowed
• Cancel all segments in the PNR first
• Use ENDO BOX format: INV REF NO [Flight#/Date-CXL]
policies.involuntary_reissue:
Involuntary Reissue (Schedule Change):
• If passenger accepts new flight → reissue with ENDO BOX: INVOL SKCHG
• If passenger rejects → rebook closest available flight in same RBD
• If same class unavailable → contact neosair@apg-ga.us
• No waiver required
Voluntary changes follow fare rules. Penalties and fare differences may apply based on fare basis
policies.voluntary_refund:
• Follow fare rules associated with the ticket
• Refunds subject to cancellation penalties and service fees
• If ticket is non-refundable, taxes are also non-refundable
policies.medical_refund:
Neos HQ requires a case opened via their website by agent or passenger:
https://identity.ticketing-neosair.it/Identity/Account/Register?returnUrl=%2Fconnect%2Fauthorize%2Fcallback%3Fclient_id%3Dneos.customercare%26redirect_uri%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fcustomercare.neosair.it%252FAccount%252FExternalLogin
policies.name_change:
If same RBD available and correction ≤3 letters:
• Agency refunds ticket with wrong name
• Agency issues new ticket with correct name (same RBD, route, carrier)
• Agency must contact neosair@apg-ga.us to request waiver code for refund of wrong ticket
• Waiver must be entered in ENDO BOX
If same RBD not available or correction >3 letters:
• Send request to usa@apg-ga.us
• Neos HQ performs name correction and agency loses booking control
• Must attach passport, include Neos PNR, wrong name and correct name
policies.group_booking:
• A group is defined as 10 or more passengers traveling together
• Send request with preferred itinerary to neosair@apg-ga.us
policies.seat_request_policy: • Advance selection may be available based on fare
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
If GDS void fails within 24 hours:
• Send email to neosair@apg-ga.us with screenshot proof of when the void was requested
